verses.verse: And it shall be <S%H935><s%>, when you are come in unto the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and possessest <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H3427><s%>, and dwell in it;

That you shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the first <S%H7225><s%> of all the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>, which you shall bring <S%H935><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H7760><s%>, and shall put it in a basket <S%H2935><s%>, and shall go <S%H1980><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name there <S%H8034><s%>.

And you shall go <S%H935><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%> that shall be in those days <S%H3117><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5046><s%>, I profess this day <S%H3117><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, that I am come <S%H935><s%> unto the country <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%> for to give us <S%H5414><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> the basket <S%H2935><s%> out of your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and set it down <S%H3240><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

And you shall speak <S%H6030><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, A Syrian <S%H761><s%> ready to perish <S%H6><s%> was my father <S%H1><s%>, and he went down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and stayed <S%H1481><s%> there with <S%H4962><s%> a few <S%H4592><s%>, and became there a nation <S%H1471><s%>, great <S%H1419><s%>, mighty <S%H6099><s%>, and populous <S%H7227><s%>:
And the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> evilly dealt <S%H7489><s%> us <S%H6031><s%>, and afflicted us <S%H5414><s%>, and laid upon us hard <S%H7186><s%> bondage <S%H5656><s%>:

And when we cried <S%H6817><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%>, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> our voice <S%H6963><s%>, and looked <S%H7200><s%> on our affliction <S%H6040><s%>, and our labor <S%H5999><s%>, and our oppression <S%H3906><s%>:

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, and with great <S%H1419><s%> terribleness <S%H4172><s%>, and with signs <S%H226><s%>, and with wonders <S%H4159><s%>:

And he has brought <S%H935><s%> us into this place <S%H4725><s%>, and has given <S%H5414><s%> us this land <S%H776><s%>, even a land <S%H776><s%> that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

And now <S%H935><s%>, behold, I have brought the firstfruits <S%H6529><s%> of the land <S%H127><s%>, which you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, have given <S%H5414><s%> me <S%H3240><s%>. And you shall set it before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>:

And you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in every good <S%H2896><s%> thing which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> unto you <S%H1004><s%>, and unto your house, you <S%H3881><s%>, and the Levite, and the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is among you <S%H7130><s%>.

When you have made an end <S%H3615><s%> of tithing <S%H6237><s%> all the tithes <S%H4643><s%> of your increase <S%H8393><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, which is the year <S%H8141><s%> of tithing <S%H4643><s%>, and have given <S%H5414><s%> it unto the Levite <S%H3881><s%>, the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and the widow <S%H490><s%>, that they may eat <S%H398><s%> inside your gates <S%H8179><s%>, and be filled <S%H7646><s%>;

Then you shall say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, I have brought away <S%H1197><s%> the hallowed things <S%H6944><s%> out of my house <S%H1004><s%>, and also have given <S%H5414><s%> them unto the Levite <S%H3881><s%>, and unto the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, to the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and to the widow <S%H490><s%>, according to all your commandments <S%H4687><s%> which you have commanded <S%H6680><s%> me <S%H5674><s%>: I have not transgressed your commandments <S%H4687><s%>, neither have I forgotten them <S%H7911><s%>:

I have not eaten <S%H398><s%> there in my mourning <S%H205><s%>, neither have I taken away <S%H1197><s%> anything there for any unclean <S%H2931><s%> use <S%H5414><s%>, nor given anything there for the dead <S%H4191><s%>: but I have listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, and have done <S%H6213><s%> according to all that you have commanded me <S%H6680><s%>.

Look down <S%H8259><s%> from your holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation <S%H4583><s%>, from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and bless <S%H1288><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and the land <S%H127><s%> which you have given <S%H5414><s%> us <S%H7650><s%>, as you swore unto our fathers <S%H1><s%>, a land <S%H776><s%> that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

This day <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to do <S%H6213><s%> these statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%>: you shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them with all your heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all your soul <S%H5315><s%>.

You have declared <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> to be your God <S%H430><s%>, and to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to keep <S%H8104><s%> his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and his judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and to listen <S%H8085><s%> unto his voice <S%H6963><s%>:

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has declared <S%H559><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> to be his peculiar <S%H5459><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, as he has promised <S%H1696><s%> you <S%H8104><s%>, and that you should keep all his commandments <S%H4687><s%>;

And to make <S%H5414><s%> you high <S%H5945><s%> above all nations <S%H1471><s%> which he has made <S%H6213><s%>, in praise <S%H8416><s%>, and in name <S%H8034><s%>, and in honor <S%H8597><s%>; and that you may be a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, as he has spoken <S%H1696><s%>.
